item.title: How to Fix Nil Error During Setting Sass Hugo
item.description: Error # index.html:6:46": execute of template failed: template: index.html:6:46: executing “index.html” at <resources.ToCSS>: error calling ToCSS: type not supported in Resource transformations It was a bit time wasting. but the asset folder must be created in root folder. Solution # then the following lines worked. {{ $sass := resources.Get "sass/main.scss" }} {{ $style := $sass | resources.ToCSS }} <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{ $style.Permalink }}"> Attention # There is another asset folder in resource/_gen.
